item.title: Which Programming Language Should I Learn?
item.description: A student asked me what are the best programming languages for them to learn, if they are interested in #CyberSecurity? What say you, #Security peeps? — Helen Patton (@OSUCISOHelen) January 11, 2020 Short answer python. What if you want to overthink it a bit though. The TIOBE Index bases it’s pulse off a number of inputs including YouTube, Baidu, Bing, and Google searches. Your mileage may vary, but this is still a useful clue for you regarding the rising and falling in popularity for any given language of interest.
